name: Mittens McGraw - The Bird's Nest
description:
A point and click adventure game, starring smarmy PI and scruffy ginger cat Mittens McGraw! 

The game was made by a team of six at Odd Spot Studios, as our final project while studying at the Academy of Interactive Entertainment Melbourne. 

This is but a brief snippet of a planned larger game, so chances are we'll come back to Mittens at some point and make a more polished, fully fledged detective adventure with the whole story!

For now, enjoy what's here, fellow gumshoes!
